name: iRankHub
description: iRankHub: iDebate’s dedicated platform for managing debate tournaments with precision. Created by iDebate, iRankHub optimizes every round with tools for ballot scoring, volunteer feedback, and student insights on judging quality. Access real-time stats, performance data, and detailed reports that elevate the debate experience and bring accuracy to every tournament. Discover how iDebate refines debates with iRankHub!
